item.title: Dubai Is a Vision of the Future
item.description: The city is dramatically rewriting the story of skilled migration.

item.title: Ukraine and U.S. Talks on War Begin as Gulfs Remain
item.description: American and Ukrainian representatives are meeting in Saudi Arabia, but the United States, Ukraine and Russia envisage very different paths to peace.

item.title: Ramadan in the West Bank: Displacement and Despair
item.description: An Israeli military operation has uprooted tens of thousands of Palestinians who can’t break their fast in their own homes and don’t know when, or if,...

item.title: Separatists Hijack Train Carrying Over 400 Passengers in Pakistan
item.description: The authorities were struggling to reach the remote site of the ambush in the country’s southwest, and the passengers’ fate was not immediately known.

item.title: Stocks Pare Losses After Trump’s Moves and Comments Rattled Investors
item.description: Investors were shaken by President Trump’s latest tariff threat, dragging the S&P 500 down further after its worst day of the year.
